our_industries.b: Innovation is one of the main key points to stay one step ahead. Therefore, a comprehensive well-being is important as well as taking care of all aspects of the lives of our brand partners.
our_industries.c: At Digital Trust, we fund extremely strong industries that are booming, such as the cultivation of medical cannabis, trading in different financial markets, online gaming, health and wellness products with maximum absorption technology.

b: Your earnings are automatically credited to your DigitalTrust account every 24 hours.
Do not hesitate to contact our support team, your questions and requests are dealt with promptly.
You can withdraw your earnings at any time, which are sent to an external wallet, bank transfer or check in a maximum of one week.

c: Make a deposit to one or more memberships
Withdraw your earnings. And to enjoy...

b.a: How does your company make money?
b.b: We earn our commissions on whatever % we make above and beyond your dividend on a monthly basis.

Yes a 6 month holding period. Why? It gives us enough time to earn the returns guaranteed to you the investor on a monthly basis and makes us a profitable company. Can I liquidate before 6 months? Yes if emergency arises. We will need a hand written letter stating the reason and you will accrue a 10% penalty.

b.a: How will I receive my monthly dividends?
b.b: The same way you funded your account via bank wire or check.

b.a: Are you a licensed and regulated investment company?
b.b: Yes we are an upstanding active US corp.

b.a: How long have you been in the business?
Will and when do I receive statements?
b.b: Yes. You can view your account online daily which is updated every 24 hours.

b.a: Is your company a full service brokerage firm?
b.b: No. We concentrate on portfolio management within the crypto markets as that´s where our expertise lies.
No. We aren´t CPA´S or accountants. You are responsible for your earnings and or profits according to your tax bracket. Please discuss with your personal accountant.

b.a: What are the Risks vs Rewards?
b.b: Well first your guaranteed to receive your monthly dividend on time and for the % stated in your investment agreement. If we couldn´t meet these returns month in and month out we wouldn´t be a functioning or profitable company and expanding worldwide.

b: The main mission of Digital Trust Investments Corp is to provide its users with effective ways to receive royalty payments from the use of quantum technologies, cryptocurrencies, trading robots, professional traders, foreign money exchange markets, cannabis plantations in California, building commodities, health care, online gaming and personal credit services in North and Latin America, as well as to grant its users with an exclusive access to its strategic partners' information.

However, being an open model in continuous evolution, we have several additional sources of income, which add up by giving support and strength to the economic engine of the project to make it sustainable over time, allowing our entrepreneurial community around the world to form a solid block creating new profit strategies.
Our portfolio allows us to have a very profitable business even in times of crisis, like now. This 2021 we start our international expansion program.

texts.text: Registering with Digital Trust is very easy. Here we will guide you how to do it:
1) Enter the platform, in the upper right part of this screen there is a link with the text "Login"
2) Once on the platform, the login window should appear, to create your account you must click at the bottom, on the "Sign up" button
3) You must fill out a form with the necessary information to create your account, accept the Privacy Policies and Terms and Conditions of Digital Trust, and click on "Start"
4) Welcome to Digital Trust
To invest and start earning in Digital Trust, you must make a deposit. Here we will guide you how to do it:
1) On your Digital Trust dashboard you should see a green button with the text Deposit.

2) After clicking on this button, you will see the membership options, you can choose a membership that you want to buy or deposit more in a membership that you already have. Select one, and click Continue at the bottom.

3) Select the payment gateway of your choice. You can make deposits with PayPal, Stripe or Coinpayments if you want to use their cryptocurrencies. You also have the possibility of reinvesting your earnings with the Balance option, but if you do not have earnings, the option will not be available yet. Select one, and click Continue at the bottom.

4) Enter the amount to deposit. Depending on the membership there are different minimum and maximum values. In case you are depositing into a membership that you already own, the minimum value is $ 500. In case of paying with CoinPayments, you must select the cryptocurrency to use between Bitcoin, Etherum and Tether USD. Confirm your deposit value and click Pay at the bottom.
5) Follow the steps proposed by each payment gateway, once the procedure has been carried out successfully, you will see your investment reflected on your dashboard.

sections.title: How do I withdraw my earnings?

texts.text: You can withdraw earnings from Digital Trust whenever you want. Here we will guide you how to do it:
1) On your Digital Trust dashboard you should see a yellow-orange button with the text Withdrawal.

2) After clicking on this button, you will see the options that Digital Trust has to send you your earnings. It is important that you fill in your profile details with the information necessary to send you the money. Select a method, and click continue at the bottom.

3) Enter the amount to withdraw. The amount available to withdraw depends on your available balance at the time. The available balance is all the profit that you have accumulated in your balance for at least one month. Confirm your deposit value and click Confirm at the bottom.
4) The Digital Trust team will be notified of your withdrawal and will proceed to send you your earnings, once the procedure is successful, you will see your deposit reflected on your dashboard.

sections.title: How do I complete my profile data?

texts.text: It is important to have your profile data complete and updated, so we can send you your earnings in a more agile way. Here we will guide you how to do it:
1) On your Digital Trust dashboard you should see a sidebar on the left side or the menu button on the top right.
2) After clicking, you will be able to see the Setting option, click and you will be redirected to a form with your profile data
3) Update your details. Do not provide sensitive information, such as bank keys or passwords for your electronic wallet, add only the data necessary so that our team can send you your earnings
4) When finished, click Save and your profile will be updated..
